 129 /*
 130  * This describes a format item.  The parse_display_format routine parses
 131  * the user specified format and creates a linked list of format_e structures.
 132  */
 133 typedef struct format_e
 134 {
 135     struct format_e *next;
 136     int requested_field_len;
 137     int field_len;
 138     align_crt_t just_mode;
 139     gboolean expand;
 140     const char *(*string_fn) (file_entry_t *, int len);
 141     char *title;
 142     const char *id;
 143 } format_e;

 377 static void
 378 set_colors (const WPanel * panel)
     /*  [+378 src/filemanager/panel.c] */
 379 {
 380     (void) panel;
 381 
 382     tty_set_normal_attrs ();
 383     tty_setcolor (NORMAL_COLOR);
 384 }
 385 
 386 /* --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
 387 /** Delete format string, it is a linked list */
 388 
 389 static void
 390 delete_format (format_e * format)
     /*  [+390 src/filemanager/panel.c] */
 391 {
 392     while (format != NULL)
 393     {
 394         format_e *next = format->next;
 395         g_free (format->title);
 396         g_free (format);
 397         format = next;
 398     }
 399 }
 400 
 401 /* --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
 402 /** Extract the number of available lines in a panel */
 403 
 404 static int
 405 panel_lines (const WPanel * p)
     /*  [+405 src/filemanager/panel.c] */
 406 {
 407     /* 3 lines are: top frame, column header, botton frame */
 408     return (CONST_WIDGET (p)->lines - 3 - (panels_options.show_mini_info ? 2 : 0));
 409 }
 410 
 411 /* --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
 412 /** This code relies on the default justification!!! */
 413 
 414 static void
 415 add_permission_string (const char *dest, int width, file_entry_t * fe, int attr, int color,
     /*  [+415 src/filemanager/panel.c] */
 416                        gboolean is_octal)
 417 {
 418     int i, r, l;
 419 
 420     l = get_user_permissions (&fe->st);
 421 
 422     if (is_octal)
 423     {
 424         /* Place of the access bit in octal mode */
 425         l = width + l - 3;
 426         r = l + 1;
 427     }
 428     else
 429     {
 430         /* The same to the triplet in string mode */
 431         l = l * 3 + 1;
 432         r = l + 3;
 433     }
 434 
 435     for (i = 0; i < width; i++)
 436     {
 437         if (i >= l && i < r)
 438         {
 439             if (attr == SELECTED || attr == MARKED_SELECTED)
 440                 tty_setcolor (MARKED_SELECTED_COLOR);
 441             else
 442                 tty_setcolor (MARKED_COLOR);
 443         }
 444         else if (color >= 0)
 445             tty_setcolor (color);
 446         else
 447             tty_lowlevel_setcolor (-color);
 448 
 449         tty_print_char (dest[i]);
 450     }
 451 }

 453 /* --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
 454 /** String representations of various file attributes name */
 455 
 456 static const char *
 457 string_file_name (file_entry_t * fe, int len)
     /*  [+457 src/filemanager/panel.c] */
 458 {
 459     static char buffer[MC_MAXPATHLEN * MB_LEN_MAX + 1];
 460 
 461     (void) len;
 462 
 463     g_strlcpy (buffer, fe->fname, sizeof (buffer));
 464     return buffer;
 465 }

 467 /* --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
 468 
 469 static unsigned int
 470 ilog10 (dev_t n)
     /*  [+470 src/filemanager/panel.c] */
 471 {
 472     unsigned int digits = 0;
 473 
 474     do
 475     {
 476         digits++;
 477         n /= 10;
 478     }
 479     while (n != 0);
 480 
 481     return digits;
 482 }
 483 
 484 /* --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
 485 
 486 static void
 487 format_device_number (char *buf, size_t bufsize, dev_t dev)
     /*  [+487 src/filemanager/panel.c] */
 488 {
 489     dev_t major_dev = major (dev);
 490     dev_t minor_dev = minor (dev);
 491     unsigned int major_digits = ilog10 (major_dev);
 492     unsigned int minor_digits = ilog10 (minor_dev);
 493 
 494     g_assert (bufsize >= 1);
 495 
 496     if (major_digits + 1 + minor_digits + 1 <= bufsize)
 497         g_snprintf (buf, bufsize, "%lu,%lu", (unsigned long) major_dev, (unsigned long) minor_dev);
 498     else
 499         g_strlcpy (buf, _("[dev]"), bufsize);
 500 }
 501 
 502 /* --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
 503 /** size */
 504 
 505 static const char *
 506 string_file_size (file_entry_t * fe, int len)
     /*  [+506 src/filemanager/panel.c] */
 507 {
 508     static char buffer[BUF_TINY];
 509 
 510     /* Don't ever show size of ".." since we don't calculate it */
 511     if (DIR_IS_DOTDOT (fe->fname))
 512         return _("UP--DIR");
 513 
 514 #ifdef HAVE_STRUCT_STAT_ST_RDEV
 515     if (S_ISBLK (fe->st.st_mode) || S_ISCHR (fe->st.st_mode))
 516         format_device_number (buffer, len + 1, fe->st.st_rdev);
 517     else
 518 #endif
 519         size_trunc_len (buffer, (unsigned int) len, fe->st.st_size, 0, panels_options.kilobyte_si);
 520 
 521     return buffer;
 522 }
 523 
 524 /* --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
 525 /** bsize */
 526 
 527 static const char *
 528 string_file_size_brief (file_entry_t * fe, int len)
     /*  [+528 src/filemanager/panel.c] */
 529 {
 530     if (S_ISLNK (fe->st.st_mode) && !link_isdir (fe))
 531         return _("SYMLINK");
 532 
 533     if ((S_ISDIR (fe->st.st_mode) || link_isdir (fe)) && !DIR_IS_DOTDOT (fe->fname))
 534         return _("SUB-DIR");
 535 
 536     return string_file_size (fe, len);
 537 }
 538 
 539 /* --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
 540 /** This functions return a string representation of a file entry type */
 541 
 542 static const char *
 543 string_file_type (file_entry_t * fe, int len)
     /*  [+543 src/filemanager/panel.c] */
 544 {
 545     static char buffer[2];
 546 
 547     (void) len;
 548 
 549     if (S_ISDIR (fe->st.st_mode))
 550         buffer[0] = PATH_SEP;
 551     else if (S_ISLNK (fe->st.st_mode))
 552     {
 553         if (link_isdir (fe))
 554             buffer[0] = '~';
 555         else if (fe->f.stale_link)
 556             buffer[0] = '!';
 557         else
 558             buffer[0] = '@';
 559     }
 560     else if (S_ISCHR (fe->st.st_mode))
 561         buffer[0] = '-';
 562     else if (S_ISSOCK (fe->st.st_mode))
 563         buffer[0] = '=';
 564     else if (S_ISDOOR (fe->st.st_mode))
 565         buffer[0] = '>';
 566     else if (S_ISBLK (fe->st.st_mode))
 567         buffer[0] = '+';
 568     else if (S_ISFIFO (fe->st.st_mode))
 569         buffer[0] = '|';
 570     else if (S_ISNAM (fe->st.st_mode))
 571         buffer[0] = '#';
 572     else if (!S_ISREG (fe->st.st_mode))
 573         buffer[0] = '?';        /* non-regular of unknown kind */
 574     else if (is_exe (fe->st.st_mode))
 575         buffer[0] = '*';
 576     else
 577         buffer[0] = ' ';
 578     buffer[1] = '\0';
 579     return buffer;
 580 }

 582 /* --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
 583 /** mtime */

 753 /* --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
 754 
 755 static int
 756 file_compute_color (int attr, file_entry_t * fe)
     /*  [+756 src/filemanager/panel.c] */
 757 {
 758     switch (attr)
 759     {
 760     case SELECTED:
 761         return (SELECTED_COLOR);
 762     case MARKED:
 763         return (MARKED_COLOR);
 764     case MARKED_SELECTED:
 765         return (MARKED_SELECTED_COLOR);
 766     case STATUS:
 767         return (NORMAL_COLOR);
 768     case NORMAL:
 769     default:
 770         if (!panels_options.filetype_mode)
 771             return (NORMAL_COLOR);
 772     }
 773 
 774     return mc_fhl_get_color (mc_filehighlight, fe);
 775 }

 777 /* --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
 778 /** Returns the number of items in the given panel */
 779 
 780 static int
 781 panel_items (const WPanel * p)
     /*  [+781 src/filemanager/panel.c] */
 782 {
 783     return panel_lines (p) * p->list_cols;
 784 }
 785 
 786 /* --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
 787 /** Formats the file number file_index of panel in the buffer dest */
 788 
 789 static filename_scroll_flag_t
 790 format_file (WPanel * panel, int file_index, int width, int attr, gboolean isstatus,
     /*  [+790 src/filemanager/panel.c] */
 791              int *field_length)
 792 {
 793     int color = NORMAL_COLOR;
 794     int length = 0;
 795     format_e *format, *home;
 796     file_entry_t *fe = NULL;
 797     filename_scroll_flag_t res = FILENAME_NOSCROLL;
 798 
 799     *field_length = 0;
 800 
 801     if (file_index < panel->dir.len)
 802     {
 803         fe = &panel->dir.list[file_index];
 804         color = file_compute_color (attr, fe);
 805     }
 806 
 807     home = isstatus ? panel->status_format : panel->format;
 808 
 809     for (format = home; format != NULL && length != width; format = format->next)
 810     {
 811         if (format->string_fn != NULL)
 812         {
 813             const char *txt = " ";
 814             int len, perm = 0;
 815             const char *prepared_text;
 816             int name_offset = 0;
 817 
 818             if (fe != NULL)
 819                 txt = format->string_fn (fe, format->field_len);
 820 
 821             len = format->field_len;
 822             if (len + length > width)
 823                 len = width - length;
 824             if (len <= 0)
 825                 break;
 826 
 827             if (!isstatus && panel->content_shift > -1 && strcmp (format->id, "name") == 0)
 828             {
 829                 int str_len;
 830                 int i;
 831 
 832                 *field_length = len + 1;
 833 
 834                 str_len = str_length (txt);
 835                 i = MAX (0, str_len - len);
 836                 panel->max_shift = MAX (panel->max_shift, i);
 837                 i = MIN (panel->content_shift, i);
 838 
 839                 if (i > -1)
 840                 {
 841                     name_offset = str_offset_to_pos (txt, i);
 842                     if (str_len > len)
 843                     {
 844                         res = FILENAME_SCROLL_LEFT;
 845                         if (str_length (txt + name_offset) > len)
 846                             res |= FILENAME_SCROLL_RIGHT;
 847                     }
 848                 }
 849             }
 850 
 851             if (panels_options.permission_mode)
 852             {
 853                 if (strcmp (format->id, "perm") == 0)
 854                     perm = 1;
 855                 else if (strcmp (format->id, "mode") == 0)
 856                     perm = 2;
 857             }
 858 
 859             if (color >= 0)
 860                 tty_setcolor (color);
 861             else
 862                 tty_lowlevel_setcolor (-color);
 863 
 864             if (!isstatus && panel->content_shift > -1)
 865                 prepared_text =
 866                     str_fit_to_term (txt + name_offset, len, HIDE_FIT (format->just_mode));
 867             else
 868                 prepared_text = str_fit_to_term (txt, len, format->just_mode);
 869 
 870             if (perm != 0 && fe != NULL)
 871                 add_permission_string (prepared_text, format->field_len, fe, attr, color,
 872                                        perm != 1);
 873             else
 874                 tty_print_string (prepared_text);
 875 
 876             length += len;
 877         }
 878         else
 879         {
 880             if (attr == SELECTED || attr == MARKED_SELECTED)
 881                 tty_setcolor (SELECTED_COLOR);
 882             else
 883                 tty_setcolor (NORMAL_COLOR);
 884             tty_print_one_vline (TRUE);
 885             length++;
 886         }
 887     }
 888 
 889     if (length < width)
 890     {
 891         int y, x;
 892 
 893         tty_getyx (&y, &x);
 894         tty_draw_hline (y, x, ' ', width - length);
 895     }
 896 
 897     return res;
 898 }
 899 
 900 /* --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
 901 
 902 static void
 903 repaint_file (WPanel * panel, int file_index, gboolean mv, int attr, gboolean isstatus)
     /*  [+903 src/filemanager/panel.c] */
 904 {
 905     Widget *w = WIDGET (panel);
 906 
 907     int nth_column = 0;
 908     int width;
 909     int offset = 0;
 910     filename_scroll_flag_t ret_frm;
 911     int ypos = 0;
 912     gboolean panel_is_split;
 913     int fln = 0;
 914 
 915     panel_is_split = !isstatus && panel->list_cols > 1;
 916     width = w->cols - 2;
 917 
 918     if (panel_is_split)
 919     {
 920         nth_column = (file_index - panel->top_file) / panel_lines (panel);
 921         width /= panel->list_cols;
 922 
 923         offset = width * nth_column;
 924 
 925         if (nth_column + 1 >= panel->list_cols)
 926             width = w->cols - offset - 2;
 927     }
 928 
 929     /* Nothing to paint */
 930     if (width <= 0)
 931         return;
 932 
 933     if (mv)
 934     {
 935         ypos = file_index - panel->top_file;
 936 
 937         if (panel_is_split)
 938             ypos %= panel_lines (panel);
 939 
 940         ypos += 2;              /* top frame and header */
 941         widget_move (w, ypos, offset + 1);
 942     }
 943 
 944     ret_frm = format_file (panel, file_index, width, attr, isstatus, &fln);
 945 
 946     if (panel_is_split && nth_column + 1 < panel->list_cols)
 947     {
 948         tty_setcolor (NORMAL_COLOR);
 949         tty_print_one_vline (TRUE);
 950     }
 951 
 952     if (ret_frm != FILENAME_NOSCROLL && mv)
 953     {
 954         if (!panel_is_split && fln > 0)
 955         {
 956             if (panel->list_type != list_long)
 957                 width = fln;
 958             else
 959             {
 960                 offset = width - fln + 1;
 961                 width = fln - 1;
 962             }
 963         }
 964 
 965         widget_move (w, ypos, offset);
 966         tty_setcolor (NORMAL_COLOR);
 967         tty_print_string (panel_filename_scroll_left_char);
 968 
 969         if ((ret_frm & FILENAME_SCROLL_RIGHT) != 0)
 970         {
 971             offset += width;
 972             if (nth_column + 1 >= panel->list_cols)
 973                 offset++;
 974 
 975             widget_move (w, ypos, offset);
 976             tty_setcolor (NORMAL_COLOR);
 977             tty_print_string (panel_filename_scroll_right_char);
 978         }
 979     }
 980 }
 981 
 982 /* --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
 983 
 984 static void
 985 display_mini_info (WPanel * panel)
     /*  [+985 src/filemanager/panel.c] */
 986 {
 987     Widget *w = WIDGET (panel);
 988 
 989     if (!panels_options.show_mini_info)
 990         return;
 991 
 992     widget_move (w, panel_lines (panel) + 3, 1);
 993 
 994     if (panel->searching)
 995     {
 996         tty_setcolor (INPUT_COLOR);
 997         tty_print_char ('/');
 998         tty_print_string (str_fit_to_term (panel->search_buffer, w->cols - 3, J_LEFT));
 999         return;
1000     }
1001 
1002     /* Status resolves links and show them */
1003     set_colors (panel);
1004 
1005     if (S_ISLNK (panel->dir.list[panel->selected].st.st_mode))
1006     {
1007         char link_target[MC_MAXPATHLEN];
1008         vfs_path_t *lc_link_vpath;
1009         int len;
1010 
1011         lc_link_vpath =
1012             vfs_path_append_new (panel->cwd_vpath, panel->dir.list[panel->selected].fname,
1013                                  (char *) NULL);
1014         len = mc_readlink (lc_link_vpath, link_target, MC_MAXPATHLEN - 1);
1015         vfs_path_free (lc_link_vpath);
1016         if (len > 0)
1017         {
1018             link_target[len] = 0;
1019             tty_print_string ("-> ");
1020             tty_print_string (str_fit_to_term (link_target, w->cols - 5, J_LEFT_FIT));
1021         }
1022         else
1023             tty_print_string (str_fit_to_term (_("<readlink failed>"), w->cols - 2, J_LEFT));
1024     }
1025     else if (DIR_IS_DOTDOT (panel->dir.list[panel->selected].fname))
1026     {
1027         /* FIXME:
1028          * while loading directory (dir_list_load() and dir_list_reload()),
1029          * the actual stat info about ".." directory isn't got;
1030          * so just don't display incorrect info about ".." directory */
1031         tty_print_string (str_fit_to_term (_("UP--DIR"), w->cols - 2, J_LEFT));
1032     }
1033     else
1034         /* Default behavior */
1035         repaint_file (panel, panel->selected, FALSE, STATUS, TRUE);
1036 }
1037 
1038 /* --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
1039 
1040 static void
1041 paint_dir (WPanel * panel)
     /*  [+1041 src/filemanager/panel.c] */
1042 {
1043     int i;
1044     int items;                  /* Number of items */
1045 
1046     items = panel_items (panel);
1047     /* reset max len of filename because we have the new max length for the new file list */
1048     panel->max_shift = -1;
1049 
1050     for (i = 0; i < items; i++)
1051     {
1052         int color = 0;          /* Color value of the line */
1053 
1054         if (i + panel->top_file < panel->dir.len)
1055         {
1056             color = 2 * (panel->dir.list[i + panel->top_file].f.marked);
1057             color += (panel->selected == i + panel->top_file && panel->active);
1058         }
1059 
1060         repaint_file (panel, i + panel->top_file, TRUE, color, FALSE);
1061     }
1062 
1063     tty_set_normal_attrs ();
1064 }

1066 /* --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
1067 
1068 static void
1069 display_total_marked_size (const WPanel * panel, int y, int x, gboolean size_only)
     /*  [+1069 src/filemanager/panel.c] */
1070 {
1071     const Widget *w = CONST_WIDGET (panel);
1072 
1073     char buffer[BUF_SMALL], b_bytes[BUF_SMALL];
1074     const char *buf;
1075     int cols;
1076 
1077     if (panel->marked <= 0)
1078         return;
1079 
1080     buf = size_only ? b_bytes : buffer;
1081     cols = w->cols - 2;
1082 
1083     g_strlcpy (b_bytes, size_trunc_sep (panel->total, panels_options.kilobyte_si),
1084                sizeof (b_bytes));
1085 
1086     if (!size_only)
1087         g_snprintf (buffer, sizeof (buffer),
1088                     ngettext ("%s in %d file", "%s in %d files", panel->marked),
1089                     b_bytes, panel->marked);
1090 
1091     /* don't forget spaces around buffer content */
1092     buf = str_trunc (buf, cols - 4);
1093 
1094     if (x < 0)
1095         /* center in panel */
1096         x = (w->cols - str_term_width1 (buf)) / 2 - 1;
1097 
1098     /*
1099      * y == panel_lines (panel) + 2  for mini_info_separator
1100      * y == w->lines - 1             for panel bottom frame
1101      */
1102     widget_move (w, y, x);
1103     tty_setcolor (MARKED_COLOR);
1104     tty_printf (" %s ", buf);
1105 }

1107 /* --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */

1109 static void
1110 mini_info_separator (const WPanel * panel)
     /*  [+1110 src/filemanager/panel.c] */
1111 {
1112     if (panels_options.show_mini_info)
1113     {
1114         const Widget *w = CONST_WIDGET (panel);
1115         int y;
1116 
1117         y = panel_lines (panel) + 2;
1118 
1119         tty_setcolor (NORMAL_COLOR);
1120         tty_draw_hline (w->y + y, w->x + 1, ACS_HLINE, w->cols - 2);
1121         /* Status displays total marked size.
1122          * Centered in panel, full format. */
1123         display_total_marked_size (panel, y, -1, FALSE);
1124     }
1125 }
1126 
1127 /* --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
1128 
1129 static void
1130 show_free_space (const WPanel * panel)
     /*  [+1130 src/filemanager/panel.c] */
1131 {
1132     /* Used to figure out how many free space we have */
1133     static struct my_statfs myfs_stats;
1134     /* Old current working directory for displaying free space */
1135     static char *old_cwd = NULL;
1136 
1137     /* Don't try to stat non-local fs */
1138     if (!vfs_file_is_local (panel->cwd_vpath) || !free_space)
1139         return;
1140 
1141     if (old_cwd == NULL || strcmp (old_cwd, vfs_path_as_str (panel->cwd_vpath)) != 0)
1142     {
1143         char rpath[PATH_MAX];
1144 
1145         init_my_statfs ();
1146         g_free (old_cwd);
1147         old_cwd = g_strdup (vfs_path_as_str (panel->cwd_vpath));
1148 
1149         if (mc_realpath (old_cwd, rpath) == NULL)
1150             return;
1151 
1152         my_statfs (&myfs_stats, rpath);
1153     }
1154 
1155     if (myfs_stats.avail != 0 || myfs_stats.total != 0)
1156     {
1157         const Widget *w = CONST_WIDGET (panel);
1158         char buffer1[6], buffer2[6], tmp[BUF_SMALL];
1159 
1160         size_trunc_len (buffer1, sizeof (buffer1) - 1, myfs_stats.avail, 1,
1161                         panels_options.kilobyte_si);
1162         size_trunc_len (buffer2, sizeof (buffer2) - 1, myfs_stats.total, 1,
1163                         panels_options.kilobyte_si);
1164         g_snprintf (tmp, sizeof (tmp), " %s/%s (%d%%) ", buffer1, buffer2,
1165                     myfs_stats.total == 0 ? 0 :
1166                     (int) (100 * (long double) myfs_stats.avail / myfs_stats.total));
1167         widget_move (w, w->lines - 1, w->cols - 2 - (int) strlen (tmp));
1168         tty_setcolor (NORMAL_COLOR);
1169         tty_print_string (tmp);
1170     }
1171 }
1172 
1173 /* --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
1174 /**
1175  * Prepare path string for showing in panel's header.
1176  * Passwords will removed, also home dir will replaced by ~
1177  *
1178  * @param panel WPanel object
1179  *
1180  * @return newly allocated string.
1181  */
1182 
1183 static char *
1184 panel_correct_path_to_show (const WPanel * panel)
     /*  [+1184 src/filemanager/panel.c] */
1185 {
1186     vfs_path_t *last_vpath;
1187     const vfs_path_element_t *path_element;
1188     char *return_path;
1189     int elements_count;
1190 
1191     elements_count = vfs_path_elements_count (panel->cwd_vpath);
1192 
1193     /* get last path element */
1194     path_element = vfs_path_element_clone (vfs_path_get_by_index (panel->cwd_vpath, -1));
1195 
1196     if (elements_count > 1 && (strcmp (path_element->class->name, "cpiofs") == 0 ||
1197                                strcmp (path_element->class->name, "extfs") == 0 ||
1198                                strcmp (path_element->class->name, "tarfs") == 0))
1199     {
1200         const char *archive_name;
1201         const vfs_path_element_t *prev_path_element;
1202 
1203         /* get previous path element for catching archive name */
1204         prev_path_element = vfs_path_get_by_index (panel->cwd_vpath, -2);
1205         archive_name = strrchr (prev_path_element->path, PATH_SEP);
1206         if (archive_name != NULL)
1207             last_vpath = vfs_path_from_str_flags (archive_name + 1, VPF_NO_CANON);
1208         else
1209         {
1210             last_vpath = vfs_path_from_str_flags (prev_path_element->path, VPF_NO_CANON);
1211             last_vpath->relative = TRUE;
1212         }
1213     }
1214     else
1215     {
1216         last_vpath = vfs_path_new ();
1217         last_vpath->relative = TRUE;
1218     }
1219 
1220     vfs_path_add_element (last_vpath, path_element);
1221     return_path =
1222         vfs_path_to_str_flags (last_vpath, 0,
1223                                VPF_STRIP_HOME | VPF_STRIP_PASSWORD | VPF_HIDE_CHARSET);
1224     vfs_path_free (last_vpath);
1225 
1226     return return_path;
1227 }

1229 /* --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
1230 /**
1231  * Get Current path element encoding
1232  *
1233  * @param panel WPanel object
1234  *
1235  * @return newly allocated string or NULL if path charset is same as system charset
1236  */
1237 
1238 #ifdef HAVE_CHARSET
1239 static char *
1240 panel_get_encoding_info_str (const WPanel * panel)
     /*  [+1240 src/filemanager/panel.c] */
1241 {
1242     char *ret_str = NULL;
1243     const vfs_path_element_t *path_element;
1244 
1245     path_element = vfs_path_get_by_index (panel->cwd_vpath, -1);
1246     if (path_element->encoding != NULL)
1247         ret_str = g_strdup_printf ("[%s]", path_element->encoding);
1248 
1249     return ret_str;
1250 }
1251 #endif

1275     }
1276 
1277     widget_move (w, 0, 1);
1278     tty_print_string (panel_history_prev_item_sign);
1279 
1280     tmp = panels_options.show_dot_files ? panel_hiddenfiles_sign_show : panel_hiddenfiles_sign_hide;
1281     tmp = g_strdup_printf ("%s[%s]%s", tmp, panel_history_show_list_sign,
1282                            panel_history_next_item_sign);
1283 
1284     widget_move (w, 0, w->cols - 6);
1285     tty_print_string (tmp);
1286 
1287     g_free (tmp);
1288 
1289     widget_move (w, 0, 3);
1290 
1291     if (panel->is_panelized)
1292         tty_printf (" %s ", _("Panelize"));
1293 #ifdef HAVE_CHARSET
1294     else
1295     {
1296         tmp = panel_get_encoding_info_str (panel);
1297         if (tmp != NULL)
1298         {
1299             tty_printf ("%s", tmp);
1300             widget_move (w, 0, 3 + strlen (tmp));
1301             g_free (tmp);
1302         }
1303     }
1304 #endif
1305 
1306     if (panel->active)
1307         tty_setcolor (REVERSE_COLOR);
1308 
1309     tmp = panel_correct_path_to_show (panel);
1310     tty_printf (" %s ", str_term_trim (tmp, MIN (MAX (w->cols - 12, 0), w->cols)));
1311     g_free (tmp);
1312 
1313     if (!panels_options.show_mini_info)
1314     {
1315         if (panel->marked == 0)
1316         {
1317             /* Show size of curret file in the bottom of panel */
1318             if (S_ISREG (panel->dir.list[panel->selected].st.st_mode))
1319             {
1320                 char buffer[BUF_SMALL];
1321 
1322                 g_snprintf (buffer, sizeof (buffer), " %s ",
1323                             size_trunc_sep (panel->dir.list[panel->selected].st.st_size,
1324                                             panels_options.kilobyte_si));
1325                 tty_setcolor (NORMAL_COLOR);
1326                 widget_move (w, w->lines - 1, 4);
1327                 tty_print_string (buffer);
1328             }
1329         }
1330         else
1331         {
1332             /* Show total size of marked files
1333              * In the bottom of panel, display size only. */
1334             display_total_marked_size (panel, w->lines - 1, 2, TRUE);
1335         }
1336     }
1337 
1338     show_free_space (panel);
1339 
1340     if (panel->active)
1341         tty_set_normal_attrs ();
1342 }

1344 /* --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
1345 
1346 static void
1347 adjust_top_file (WPanel * panel)
     /*  [+1347 src/filemanager/panel.c] */
1348 {
1349     int items;
1350 
1351     items = panel_items (panel);
1352 
1353     if (panel->dir.len <= items)
1354     {
1355         /* If all files fit, show them all. */
1356         panel->top_file = 0;
1357     }
1358     else
1359     {
1360         int i;
1361 
1362         /* top_file has to be in the range [selected-items+1, selected] so that
1363            the selected file is visible.
1364            top_file should be in the range [0, count-items] so that there's
1365            no empty space wasted.
1366            Within these ranges, adjust it by as little as possible. */
1367 
1368         if (panel->top_file < 0)
1369             panel->top_file = 0;
1370 
1371         i = panel->selected - items + 1;
1372         if (panel->top_file < i)
1373             panel->top_file = i;
1374 
1375         i = panel->dir.len - items;
1376         if (panel->top_file > i)
1377             panel->top_file = i;
1378 
1379         if (panel->top_file > panel->selected)
1380             panel->top_file = panel->selected;
1381     }
1382 }

1462 
1463 static void
1464 panel_destroy (WPanel * p)
     /*  [+1464 src/filemanager/panel.c] */
1465 {
1466     size_t i;
1467 
1468     if (panels_options.auto_save_setup)
1469     {
1470         char *name;
1471 
1472         name = panel_save_name (p);
1473         panel_save_setup (p, name);
1474         g_free (name);
1475     }
1476 
1477     panel_clean_dir (p);
1478 
1479     /* clean history */
1480     if (p->dir_history != NULL)
1481     {
1482         /* directory history is already saved before this moment */
1483         p->dir_history = g_list_first (p->dir_history);
1484         g_list_free_full (p->dir_history, g_free);
1485     }
1486     g_free (p->hist_name);
1487 
1488     delete_format (p->format);
1489     delete_format (p->status_format);
1490 
1491     g_free (p->user_format);
1492     for (i = 0; i < LIST_TYPES; i++)
1493         g_free (p->user_status_format[i]);
1494 
1495     g_free (p->dir.list);
1496     g_free (p->panel_name);
1497 
1498     vfs_path_free (p->lwd_vpath);
1499     vfs_path_free (p->cwd_vpath);
1500 }

1553 static void

     /*  [+1554 src/filemanager/panel.c] */

1583                                      ? panel_sort_up_sign : panel_sort_down_sign);

1586

1588                     && strcmp (format->id, "name") == 0)

1607         {
1608             tty_setcolor (NORMAL_COLOR);
1609             tty_print_one_vline (TRUE);
1610         }
1611     }
1612 
1613     g_string_free (format_txt, TRUE);
1614

1616         panel_paint_sort_info (panel);

1619 /* --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
1620 
1621 static const char *
1622 parse_panel_size (WPanel * panel, const char *format, gboolean isstatus)
     /*  [+1622 src/filemanager/panel.c] */
1623 {
1624     panel_display_t frame = frame_half;
1625     format = skip_separators (format);
1626 
1627     if (strncmp (format, "full", 4) == 0)
1628     {
1629         frame = frame_full;
1630         format += 4;
1631     }
1632     else if (strncmp (format, "half", 4) == 0)
1633     {
1634         frame = frame_half;
1635         format += 4;
1636     }
1637 
1638     if (!isstatus)
1639     {
1640         panel->frame_size = frame;
1641         panel->list_cols = 1;
1642     }
1643 
1644     /* Now, the optional column specifier */
1645     format = skip_separators (format);
1646 
1647     if (g_ascii_isdigit (*format))
1648     {
1649         if (!isstatus)
1650         {
1651             panel->list_cols = g_ascii_digit_value (*format);
1652             if (panel->list_cols < 1)
1653                 panel->list_cols = 1;
1654         }
1655 
1656         format++;
1657     }
1658 
1659     if (!isstatus)
1660         panel_update_cols (WIDGET (panel), panel->frame_size);
1661 
1662     return skip_separators (format);
1663 }
1664 
1665 /* Format is:
1666 
1667    all              := panel_format? format
1668    panel_format     := [full|half] [1-9]
1669    format           := one_format_e
1670    | format , one_format_e
1671 
1672    one_format_e     := just format.id [opt_size]
1673    just             := [<=>]
1674    opt_size         := : size [opt_expand]
1675    size             := [0-9]+
1676    opt_expand       := +
1677 
1678  */
1679 
1680 /* --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
1681 
1682 static format_e *
1683 parse_display_format (WPanel * panel, const char *format, char **error, gboolean isstatus,
     /*  [+1683 src/filemanager/panel.c] */
1684                       int *res_total_cols)
1685 {
1686     format_e *darr, *old = NULL, *home = NULL;  /* The formats we return */
1687     int total_cols = 0;         /* Used columns by the format */
1688     size_t i;
1689 
1690     static size_t i18n_timelength = 0;  /* flag: check ?Time length at startup */
1691 
1692     *error = NULL;
1693 
1694     if (i18n_timelength == 0)
1695     {
1696         i18n_timelength = i18n_checktimelength ();      /* Musn't be 0 */
1697 
1698         for (i = 0; panel_fields[i].id != NULL; i++)
1699             if (strcmp ("time", panel_fields[i].id + 1) == 0)
1700                 panel_fields[i].min_size = i18n_timelength;
1701     }
1702 
1703     /*
1704      * This makes sure that the panel and mini status full/half mode
1705      * setting is equal
1706      */
1707     format = parse_panel_size (panel, format, isstatus);
1708 
1709     while (*format != '\0')
1710     {                           /* format can be an empty string */
1711         align_crt_t justify;    /* Which mode. */
1712         gboolean set_justify = TRUE;    /* flag: set justification mode? */
1713         gboolean found = FALSE;
1714 
1715         darr = g_new0 (format_e, 1);
1716 
1717         /* I'm so ugly, don't look at me :-) */
1718         if (home == NULL)
1719             home = old = darr;
1720 
1721         old->next = darr;
1722         darr->next = NULL;
1723         old = darr;
1724 
1725         format = skip_separators (format);
1726 
1727         switch (*format)
1728         {
1729         case '<':
1730             justify = J_LEFT;
1731             format = skip_separators (format + 1);
1732             break;
1733         case '=':
1734             justify = J_CENTER;
1735             format = skip_separators (format + 1);
1736             break;
1737         case '>':
1738             justify = J_RIGHT;
1739             format = skip_separators (format + 1);
1740             break;
1741         default:
1742             justify = J_LEFT;
1743             set_justify = FALSE;
1744             break;
1745         }
1746 
1747         for (i = 0; panel_fields[i].id != NULL; i++)
1748         {
1749             size_t klen;
1750 
1751             klen = strlen (panel_fields[i].id);
1752 
1753             if (strncmp (format, panel_fields[i].id, klen) != 0)
1754                 continue;
1755 
1756             format += klen;
1757 
1758             darr->requested_field_len = panel_fields[i].min_size;
1759             darr->string_fn = panel_fields[i].string_fn;
1760             darr->title = g_strdup (panel_get_title_without_hotkey (panel_fields[i].title_hotkey));
1761 
1762             darr->id = panel_fields[i].id;
1763             darr->expand = panel_fields[i].expands;
1764             darr->just_mode = panel_fields[i].default_just;
1765 
1766             if (set_justify)
1767             {
1768                 if (IS_FIT (darr->just_mode))
1769                     darr->just_mode = MAKE_FIT (justify);
1770                 else
1771                     darr->just_mode = justify;
1772             }
1773             found = TRUE;
1774 
1775             format = skip_separators (format);
1776 
1777             /* If we have a size specifier */
1778             if (*format == ':')
1779             {
1780                 int req_length;
1781 
1782                 /* If the size was specified, we don't want
1783                  * auto-expansion by default
1784                  */
1785                 darr->expand = FALSE;
1786                 format++;
1787                 req_length = atoi (format);
1788                 darr->requested_field_len = req_length;
1789 
1790                 format = skip_numbers (format);
1791 
1792                 /* Now, if they insist on expansion */
1793                 if (*format == '+')
1794                 {
1795                     darr->expand = TRUE;
1796                     format++;
1797                 }
1798 
1799             }
1800 
1801             break;
1802         }
1803 
1804         if (!found)
1805         {
1806             size_t pos;
1807             char *tmp_format;
1808 
1809             pos = strlen (format);
1810             if (pos > 8)
1811                 pos = 8;
1812 
1813             tmp_format = g_strndup (format, pos);
1814             delete_format (home);
1815             *error =
1816                 g_strconcat (_("Unknown tag on display format:"), " ", tmp_format, (char *) NULL);
1817             g_free (tmp_format);
1818 
1819             return NULL;
1820         }
1821 
1822         total_cols += darr->requested_field_len;
1823     }
1824 
1825     *res_total_cols = total_cols;
1826     return home;
1827 }
1828 
1829 /* --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
1830 
1831 static format_e *
1832 use_display_format (WPanel * panel, const char *format, char **error, gboolean isstatus)
     /*  [+1832 src/filemanager/panel.c] */
1833 {
1834 #define MAX_EXPAND 4
1835     int expand_top = 0;         /* Max used element in expand */
1836     int usable_columns;         /* Usable columns in the panel */
1837     int total_cols = 0;
1838     format_e *darr, *home;
1839 
1840     if (format == NULL)
1841         format = DEFAULT_USER_FORMAT;
1842 
1843     home = parse_display_format (panel, format, error, isstatus, &total_cols);
1844 
1845     if (*error != NULL)
1846         return NULL;
1847 
1848     panel->dirty = 1;
1849 
1850     usable_columns = WIDGET (panel)->cols - 2;
1851     /* Status needn't to be split */
1852     if (!isstatus)
1853     {
1854         usable_columns /= panel->list_cols;
1855         if (panel->list_cols > 1)
1856             usable_columns--;
1857     }
1858 
1859     /* Look for the expandable fields and set field_len based on the requested field len */
1860     for (darr = home; darr != NULL && expand_top < MAX_EXPAND; darr = darr->next)
1861     {
1862         darr->field_len = darr->requested_field_len;
1863         if (darr->expand)
1864             expand_top++;
1865     }
1866 
1867     /* If we used more columns than the available columns, adjust that */
1868     if (total_cols > usable_columns)
1869     {
1870         int dif;
1871         int pdif = 0;
1872 
1873         dif = total_cols - usable_columns;
1874 
1875         while (dif != 0 && pdif != dif)
1876         {
1877             pdif = dif;
1878 
1879             for (darr = home; darr; darr = darr->next)
1880                 if (dif != 0 && darr->field_len != 1)
1881                 {
1882                     darr->field_len--;
1883                     dif--;
1884                 }
1885         }
1886 
1887         total_cols = usable_columns;    /* give up, the rest should be truncated */
1888     }
1889 
1890     /* Expand the available space */
1891     if (usable_columns > total_cols && expand_top != 0)
1892     {
1893         int i;
1894         int spaces = (usable_columns - total_cols) / expand_top;
1895 
1896         for (i = 0, darr = home; darr && (i < expand_top); darr = darr->next)
1897             if (darr->expand)
1898             {
1899                 darr->field_len += spaces;
1900                 if (i == 0)
1901                     darr->field_len += (usable_columns - total_cols) % expand_top;
1902                 i++;
1903             }
1904     }
1905     return home;
1906 }
1907 
1908 /* --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
1909 /** Given the panel->view_type returns the format string to be parsed */
1910 
1911 static const char *
1912 panel_format (WPanel * panel)
     /*  [+1912 src/filemanager/panel.c] */
1913 {
1914 
1915     switch (panel->list_type)
1916     {
1917     case list_long:
1918         return "full perm space nlink space owner space group space size space mtime space name";
1919 
1920     case list_brief:
1921         {
1922             static char format[BUF_TINY];
1923             int brief_cols = panel->brief_cols;
1924 
1925             if (brief_cols < 1)
1926                 brief_cols = 2;
1927 
1928             if (brief_cols > 9)
1929                 brief_cols = 9;
1930 
1931             g_snprintf (format, sizeof (format), "half %d type name", brief_cols);
1932             return format;
1933         }
1934 
1935     case list_user:
1936         return panel->user_format;
1937 
1938     default:
1939     case list_full:
1940         return "half type name | size | mtime";
1941     }
1942 }
1943 
1944 /* --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
1945 
1946 static const char *
1947 mini_status_format (WPanel * panel)
     /*  [+1947 src/filemanager/panel.c] */
1948 {
1949     if (panel->user_mini_status)
1950         return panel->user_status_format[panel->list_type];
1951 
1952     switch (panel->list_type)
1953     {
1954     case list_long:
1955         return "full perm space nlink space owner space group space size space mtime space name";
1956 
1957     case list_brief:
1958         return "half type name space bsize space perm space";
1959 
1960     case list_full:
1961         return "half type name";
1962 
1963     default:
1964     case list_user:
1965         return panel->user_format;
1966     }
1967 }

1972 
1973 /* --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
1974 /** Used to emulate Lynx's entering leaving a directory with the arrow keys */
1975 
1976 static cb_ret_t
1977 maybe_cd (gboolean move_up_dir)
     /*  [+1977 src/filemanager/panel.c] */
1978 {
1979     if (panels_options.navigate_with_arrows && (cmdline->buffer[0] == '\0'))
1980     {
1981         if (move_up_dir)
1982         {
1983             vfs_path_t *up_dir;
1984 
1985             up_dir = vfs_path_from_str ("..");
1986             do_cd (up_dir, cd_exact);
1987             vfs_path_free (up_dir);
1988             return MSG_HANDLED;
1989         }
1990 
1991         if (S_ISDIR (selection (current_panel)->st.st_mode)
1992             || link_isdir (selection (current_panel)))
1993         {
1994             vfs_path_t *vpath;
1995 
1996             vpath = vfs_path_from_str (selection (current_panel)->fname);
1997             do_cd (vpath, cd_exact);
1998             vfs_path_free (vpath);
1999             return MSG_HANDLED;
2000         }
2001     }
2002 
2003     return MSG_NOT_HANDLED;
2004 }

2008 /* if command line is empty then do 'cd ..' */
2009 static cb_ret_t
2010 force_maybe_cd (void)
     /*  [+2010 src/filemanager/panel.c] */
2011 {
2012     if (cmdline->buffer[0] == '\0')
2013     {
2014         vfs_path_t *up_dir = vfs_path_from_str ("..");
2015         do_cd (up_dir, cd_exact);
2016         vfs_path_free (up_dir);
2017         return MSG_HANDLED;
2018     }
2019 
2020     return MSG_NOT_HANDLED;
2021 }

2025 static inline void
2026 unselect_item (WPanel * panel)
     /*  [+2026 src/filemanager/panel.c] */
2027 {

2031 /* --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
2032 /** Select/unselect all the files like a current file by extension */
2033 
2034 static void
2035 panel_select_ext_cmd (void)
     /*  [+2035 src/filemanager/panel.c] */
2036 {
2037     gboolean do_select = !selection (current_panel)->f.marked;
2038     char *filename = selection (current_panel)->fname;
2039     char *reg_exp, *cur_file_ext;
2040     mc_search_t *search;
2041     int i;
2042 
2043     if (filename == NULL)
2044         return;
2045 
2046     cur_file_ext = strutils_regex_escape (extension (filename));
2047 
2048     if (cur_file_ext[0] != '\0')
2049         reg_exp = g_strconcat ("^.*\\.", cur_file_ext, "$", (char *) NULL);
2050     else
2051         reg_exp = g_strdup ("^[^\\.]+$");
2052 
2053     g_free (cur_file_ext);
2054 
2055     search = mc_search_new (reg_exp, NULL);
2056     search->search_type = MC_SEARCH_T_REGEX;
2057     search->is_case_sensitive = FALSE;
2058 
2059     for (i = 0; i < current_panel->dir.len; i++)
2060     {
2061         file_entry_t *file_entry = &current_panel->dir.list[i];
2062 
2063         if (DIR_IS_DOTDOT (file_entry->fname) || S_ISDIR (file_entry->st.st_mode))
2064             continue;
2065 
2066         if (!mc_search_run (search, file_entry->fname, 0, file_entry->fnamelen, NULL))
2067             continue;
2068 
2069         do_file_mark (current_panel, i, do_select);
2070     }
2071 
2072     mc_search_free (search);
2073     g_free (reg_exp);
2074 
2075 }

2077 /* --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
2078 
2079 static int
2080 panel_selected_at_half (const WPanel * panel)
     /*  [+2080 src/filemanager/panel.c] */
2081 {
2082     int lines, top;
2083 
2084     lines = panel_lines (panel);
2085 
2086     /* define top file of column */
2087     top = panel->top_file;
2088     if (panel->list_cols > 1)
2089         top += lines * ((panel->selected - top) / lines);
2090 
2091     return (panel->selected - top - lines / 2);
2092 }

2094 /* --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
2095 
2096 static void
2097 move_down (WPanel * panel)
     /*  [+2097 src/filemanager/panel.c] */
2098 {
2099     int items;
2100 
2101     if (panel->selected + 1 == panel->dir.len)
2102         return;
2103 
2104     unselect_item (panel);
2105     panel->selected++;
2106 
2107     items = panel_items (panel);
2108 
2109     if (panels_options.scroll_pages && panel->selected - panel->top_file == items)
2110     {
2111         /* Scroll window half screen */
2112         panel->top_file += items / 2;
2113         if (panel->top_file > panel->dir.len - items)
2114             panel->top_file = panel->dir.len - items;
2115         paint_dir (panel);
2116     }
2117     else if (panels_options.scroll_center && panel_selected_at_half (panel) > 0)
2118     {
2119         /* Scroll window when cursor is halfway down */
2120         panel->top_file++;
2121         if (panel->top_file > panel->dir.len - items)
2122             panel->top_file = panel->dir.len - items;
2123     }
2124     select_item (panel);
2125 }
2126 
2127 /* --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
2128 
2129 static void
2130 move_up (WPanel * panel)
     /*  [+2130 src/filemanager/panel.c] */
2131 {
2132     if (panel->selected == 0)
2133         return;
2134 
2135     unselect_item (panel);
2136     panel->selected--;
2137 
2138     if (panels_options.scroll_pages && panel->selected < panel->top_file)
2139     {
2140         /* Scroll window half screen */
2141         panel->top_file -= panel_items (panel) / 2;
2142         if (panel->top_file < 0)
2143             panel->top_file = 0;
2144         paint_dir (panel);
2145     }
2146     else if (panels_options.scroll_center && panel_selected_at_half (panel) < 0)
2147     {
2148         /* Scroll window when cursor is halfway up */
2149         panel->top_file--;
2150         if (panel->top_file < 0)
2151             panel->top_file = 0;
2152     }
2153     select_item (panel);
2154 }
2155 
2156 /* --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
2157 /** Changes the selection by lines (may be negative) */
2158 
2159 static void
2160 move_selection (WPanel * panel, int lines)
     /*  [+2160 src/filemanager/panel.c] */
2161 {
2162     int new_pos;
2163     gboolean adjust = FALSE;
2164 
2165     new_pos = panel->selected + lines;
2166     if (new_pos >= panel->dir.len)
2167         new_pos = panel->dir.len - 1;
2168 
2169     if (new_pos < 0)
2170         new_pos = 0;
2171 
2172     unselect_item (panel);
2173     panel->selected = new_pos;
2174 
2175     if (panel->selected - panel->top_file >= panel_items (panel))
2176     {
2177         panel->top_file += lines;
2178         adjust = TRUE;
2179     }
2180 
2181     if (panel->selected - panel->top_file < 0)
2182     {
2183         panel->top_file += lines;
2184         adjust = TRUE;
2185     }
2186 
2187     if (adjust)
2188     {
2189         if (panel->top_file > panel->selected)
2190             panel->top_file = panel->selected;
2191         if (panel->top_file < 0)
2192             panel->top_file = 0;
2193         paint_dir (panel);
2194     }
2195     select_item (panel);
2196 }

2299 static void
2300 next_page (WPanel * panel)
     /*  [+2300 src/filemanager/panel.c] */
2301 {
2302     int items;

2305         return;

2313     if (items == 0)
2314         panel->selected = panel->dir.len - 1;
2315     else
2316         panel->selected += items;
2317     panel->top_file += items;
2318 
2319     select_item (panel);
2320     paint_dir (panel);
2321 }

2511 /* --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
2512 
2513 static void
2514 panel_select_unselect_files (WPanel * panel, const char *title, const char *history_name,
     /*  [+2514 src/filemanager/panel.c] */
2515                              gboolean do_select)
2516 {
2517     gboolean files_only = (panels_options.select_flags & SELECT_FILES_ONLY) != 0;
2518     gboolean case_sens = (panels_options.select_flags & SELECT_MATCH_CASE) != 0;
2519     gboolean shell_patterns = (panels_options.select_flags & SELECT_SHELL_PATTERNS) != 0;
2520 
2521     char *reg_exp;
2522     mc_search_t *search;
2523     int i;
2524 
2525     quick_widget_t quick_widgets[] = {
2526         /* *INDENT-OFF* */
2527         QUICK_INPUT (INPUT_LAST_TEXT, history_name, &reg_exp, NULL,
2528                      FALSE, FALSE, INPUT_COMPLETE_FILENAMES),
2529         QUICK_START_COLUMNS,
2530             QUICK_CHECKBOX (N_("&Files only"), &files_only, NULL),
2531             QUICK_CHECKBOX (N_("&Using shell patterns"), &shell_patterns, NULL),
2532         QUICK_NEXT_COLUMN,
2533             QUICK_CHECKBOX (N_("&Case sensitive"), &case_sens, NULL),
2534         QUICK_STOP_COLUMNS,
2535         QUICK_END
2536         /* *INDENT-ON* */
2537     };
2538 
2539     quick_dialog_t qdlg = {
2540         -1, -1, 50,
2541         title, "[Select/Unselect Files]",
2542         quick_widgets, NULL, NULL
2543     };
2544 
2545     if (quick_dialog (&qdlg) == B_CANCEL)
2546         return;
2547 
2548     if (reg_exp == NULL || *reg_exp == '\0')
2549     {
2550         g_free (reg_exp);
2551         return;
2552     }
2553 
2554     search = mc_search_new (reg_exp, NULL);
2555     search->search_type = shell_patterns ? MC_SEARCH_T_GLOB : MC_SEARCH_T_REGEX;
2556     search->is_entire_line = TRUE;
2557     search->is_case_sensitive = case_sens;
2558 
2559     for (i = 0; i < panel->dir.len; i++)
2560     {
2561         if (DIR_IS_DOTDOT (panel->dir.list[i].fname))
2562             continue;
2563         if (S_ISDIR (panel->dir.list[i].st.st_mode) && files_only)
2564             continue;
2565 
2566         if (mc_search_run (search, panel->dir.list[i].fname, 0, panel->dir.list[i].fnamelen, NULL))
2567             do_file_mark (panel, i, do_select);
2568     }
2569 
2570     mc_search_free (search);
2571     g_free (reg_exp);
2572 
2573     /* result flags */
2574     panels_options.select_flags = 0;
2575     if (case_sens)
2576         panels_options.select_flags |= SELECT_MATCH_CASE;
2577     if (files_only)
2578         panels_options.select_flags |= SELECT_FILES_ONLY;
2579     if (shell_patterns)
2580         panels_options.select_flags |= SELECT_SHELL_PATTERNS;
2581 }

2614 
2615 /* --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
2616 /** Incremental search of a file name in the panel.
2617   * @param panel instance of WPanel structure
2618   * @param c_code key code
2619   */
2620 
2621 static void
2622 do_search (WPanel * panel, int c_code)
     /*  [+2622 src/filemanager/panel.c] */
2623 {
2624     size_t l;
2625     int i, sel;
2626     gboolean wrapped = FALSE;
2627     char *act;
2628     mc_search_t *search;
2629     char *reg_exp, *esc_str;
2630     gboolean is_found = FALSE;
2631 
2632     l = strlen (panel->search_buffer);
2633     if (c_code == KEY_BACKSPACE)
2634     {
2635         if (l != 0)
2636         {
2637             act = panel->search_buffer + l;
2638             str_prev_noncomb_char (&act, panel->search_buffer);
2639             act[0] = '\0';
2640         }
2641         panel->search_chpoint = 0;
2642     }
2643     else
2644     {
2645         if (c_code != 0 && (gsize) panel->search_chpoint < sizeof (panel->search_char))
2646         {
2647             panel->search_char[panel->search_chpoint] = c_code;
2648             panel->search_chpoint++;
2649         }
2650 
2651         if (panel->search_chpoint > 0)
2652         {
2653             switch (str_is_valid_char (panel->search_char, panel->search_chpoint))
2654             {
2655             case -2:
2656                 return;
2657             case -1:
2658                 panel->search_chpoint = 0;
2659                 return;
2660             default:
2661                 if (l + panel->search_chpoint < sizeof (panel->search_buffer))
2662                 {
2663                     memcpy (panel->search_buffer + l, panel->search_char, panel->search_chpoint);
2664                     l += panel->search_chpoint;
2665                     *(panel->search_buffer + l) = '\0';
2666                     panel->search_chpoint = 0;
2667                 }
2668             }
2669         }
2670     }
2671 
2672     reg_exp = g_strdup_printf ("%s*", panel->search_buffer);
2673     esc_str = strutils_escape (reg_exp, -1, ",|\\{}[]", TRUE);
2674     search = mc_search_new (esc_str, NULL);
2675     search->search_type = MC_SEARCH_T_GLOB;
2676     search->is_entire_line = TRUE;
2677 
2678     switch (panels_options.qsearch_mode)
2679     {
2680     case QSEARCH_CASE_SENSITIVE:
2681         search->is_case_sensitive = TRUE;
2682         break;
2683     case QSEARCH_CASE_INSENSITIVE:
2684         search->is_case_sensitive = FALSE;
2685         break;
2686     default:
2687         search->is_case_sensitive = panel->sort_info.case_sensitive;
2688         break;
2689     }
2690 
2691     sel = panel->selected;
2692 
2693     for (i = panel->selected; !wrapped || i != panel->selected; i++)
2694     {
2695         if (i >= panel->dir.len)
2696         {
2697             i = 0;
2698             if (wrapped)
2699                 break;
2700             wrapped = TRUE;
2701         }
2702         if (mc_search_run (search, panel->dir.list[i].fname, 0, panel->dir.list[i].fnamelen, NULL))
2703         {
2704             sel = i;
2705             is_found = TRUE;
2706             break;
2707         }
2708     }
2709     if (is_found)
2710     {
2711         unselect_item (panel);
2712         panel->selected = sel;
2713         select_item (panel);
2714         widget_redraw (WIDGET (panel));
2715     }
2716     else if (c_code != KEY_BACKSPACE)
2717     {
2718         act = panel->search_buffer + l;
2719         str_prev_noncomb_char (&act, panel->search_buffer);
2720         act[0] = '\0';
2721     }
2722     mc_search_free (search);
2723     g_free (reg_exp);
2724     g_free (esc_str);
2725 }
2726 
2727 /* --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
2728 /** Start new search.
2729   * @param panel instance of WPanel structure
2730   */
2731 
2732 static void
2733 start_search (WPanel * panel)
     /*  [+2733 src/filemanager/panel.c] */
2734 {
2735     if (panel->searching)
2736     {
2737         if (panel->selected + 1 == panel->dir.len)
2738             panel->selected = 0;
2739         else
2740             move_down (panel);
2741 
2742         /* in case if there was no search string we need to recall
2743            previous string, with which we ended previous searching */
2744         if (panel->search_buffer[0] == '\0')
2745             g_strlcpy (panel->search_buffer, panel->prev_search_buffer,
2746                        sizeof (panel->search_buffer));
2747 
2748         do_search (panel, 0);
2749     }
2750     else
2751     {
2752         panel->searching = TRUE;
2753         panel->search_buffer[0] = '\0';
2754         panel->search_char[0] = '\0';
2755         panel->search_chpoint = 0;
2756         display_mini_info (panel);
2757         mc_refresh ();
2758     }
2759 }
2760 
2761 /* --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
2762 
2763 static void
2764 stop_search (WPanel * panel)
     /*  [+2764 src/filemanager/panel.c] */
2765 {
2766     panel->searching = FALSE;
2767 
2768     /* if user had overrdied search string, we need to store it
2769        to the previous_search_buffer */
2770     if (panel->search_buffer[0] != '\0')
2771         g_strlcpy (panel->prev_search_buffer, panel->search_buffer,
2772                    sizeof (panel->prev_search_buffer));
2773 
2774     display_mini_info (panel);
2775 }

2777 /* --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
2778 /** Return TRUE if the Enter key has been processed, FALSE otherwise */
2779 
2780 static gboolean
2781 do_enter_on_file_entry (file_entry_t * fe)
     /*  [+2781 src/filemanager/panel.c] */
2782 {
2783     vfs_path_t *full_name_vpath;
2784     gboolean ok;
2785 
2786     /*
2787      * Directory or link to directory - change directory.
2788      * Try the same for the entries on which mc_lstat() has failed.
2789      */
2790     if (S_ISDIR (fe->st.st_mode) || link_isdir (fe) || (fe->st.st_mode == 0))
2791     {
2792         vfs_path_t *fname_vpath;
2793 
2794         fname_vpath = vfs_path_from_str (fe->fname);
2795         if (!do_cd (fname_vpath, cd_exact))
2796             message (D_ERROR, MSG_ERROR, _("Cannot change directory"));
2797         vfs_path_free (fname_vpath);
2798         return TRUE;
2799     }
2800 
2801     full_name_vpath = vfs_path_append_new (current_panel->cwd_vpath, fe->fname, (char *) NULL);
2802 
2803     /* Try associated command */
2804     ok = regex_command (full_name_vpath, "Open") != 0;
2805     vfs_path_free (full_name_vpath);
2806     if (ok)
2807         return TRUE;
2808 
2809     /* Check if the file is executable */
2810     full_name_vpath = vfs_path_append_new (current_panel->cwd_vpath, fe->fname, (char *) NULL);
2811     ok = (is_exe (fe->st.st_mode) && if_link_is_exe (full_name_vpath, fe));
2812     vfs_path_free (full_name_vpath);
2813     if (!ok)
2814         return FALSE;
2815 
2816     if (confirm_execute)
2817     {
2818         if (query_dialog
2819             (_("The Midnight Commander"),
2820              _("Do you really want to execute?"), D_NORMAL, 2, _("&Yes"), _("&No")) != 0)
2821             return TRUE;
2822     }
2823 
2824     if (!vfs_current_is_local ())
2825     {
2826         int ret;
2827         vfs_path_t *tmp_vpath;
2828 
2829         tmp_vpath = vfs_path_append_new (vfs_get_raw_current_dir (), fe->fname, (char *) NULL);
2830         ret = mc_setctl (tmp_vpath, VFS_SETCTL_RUN, NULL);
2831         vfs_path_free (tmp_vpath);
2832         /* We took action only if the dialog was shown or the execution
2833          * was successful */
2834         return confirm_execute || (ret == 0);
2835     }
2836 
2837     {
2838         char *tmp, *cmd;
2839 
2840         tmp = name_quote (fe->fname, FALSE);
2841         cmd = g_strconcat (".", PATH_SEP_STR, tmp, (char *) NULL);
2842         g_free (tmp);
2843         shell_execute (cmd, 0);
2844         g_free (cmd);
2845     }
2846 
2847 #ifdef HAVE_CHARSET
2848     mc_global.source_codepage = default_source_codepage;
2849 #endif
2850 
2851     return TRUE;
2852 }

2915 /* --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
2916 
2917 static void
2918 chdir_to_readlink (WPanel * panel)
     /*  [+2918 src/filemanager/panel.c] */
2919 {
2920     vfs_path_t *new_dir_vpath;
2921     char buffer[MC_MAXPATHLEN];
2922     int i;
2923     struct stat st;
2924     vfs_path_t *panel_fname_vpath;
2925     gboolean ok;
2926 
2927     if (get_other_type () != view_listing)
2928         return;
2929 
2930     if (!S_ISLNK (panel->dir.list[panel->selected].st.st_mode))
2931         return;
2932 
2933     i = readlink (selection (panel)->fname, buffer, MC_MAXPATHLEN - 1);
2934     if (i < 0)
2935         return;
2936 
2937     panel_fname_vpath = vfs_path_from_str (selection (panel)->fname);
2938     ok = (mc_stat (panel_fname_vpath, &st) >= 0);
2939     vfs_path_free (panel_fname_vpath);
2940     if (!ok)
2941         return;
2942 
2943     buffer[i] = 0;
2944     if (!S_ISDIR (st.st_mode))
2945     {
2946         char *p;
2947 
2948         p = strrchr (buffer, PATH_SEP);
2949         if (p && !p[1])
2950         {
2951             *p = 0;
2952             p = strrchr (buffer, PATH_SEP);
2953         }
2954         if (!p)
2955             return;
2956         p[1] = 0;
2957     }
2958     if (IS_PATH_SEP (*buffer))
2959         new_dir_vpath = vfs_path_from_str (buffer);
2960     else
2961         new_dir_vpath = vfs_path_append_new (panel->cwd_vpath, buffer, (char *) NULL);
2962 
2963     change_panel ();
2964     do_cd (new_dir_vpath, cd_exact);
2965     vfs_path_free (new_dir_vpath);
2966     change_panel ();
2967 
2968     move_down (panel);
2969 }

3194 /* --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
3195 /**
3196  *  If we moved to the parent directory move the selection pointer to
3197  *  the old directory name; If we leave VFS dir, remove FS specificator.
3198  *
3199  *  You do _NOT_ want to add any vfs aware code here. <pavel@ucw.cz>
3200  */
3201 
3202 static const char *
3203 get_parent_dir_name (const vfs_path_t * cwd_vpath, const vfs_path_t * lwd_vpath)
     /*  [+3203 src/filemanager/panel.c] */
3204 {
3205     size_t llen, clen;
3206     const char *p, *cwd, *lwd;
3207 
3208     llen = vfs_path_len (lwd_vpath);
3209     clen = vfs_path_len (cwd_vpath);
3210 
3211     if (llen <= clen)
3212         return NULL;
3213 
3214     cwd = vfs_path_as_str (cwd_vpath);
3215     lwd = vfs_path_as_str (lwd_vpath);
3216 
3217     p = g_strrstr (lwd, VFS_PATH_URL_DELIMITER);
3218 
3219     if (p == NULL)
3220     {
3221         p = strrchr (lwd, PATH_SEP);
3222 
3223         if ((p != NULL)
3224             && (strncmp (cwd, lwd, (size_t) (p - lwd)) == 0)
3225             && (clen == (size_t) (p - lwd) || (p == lwd && IS_PATH_SEP (cwd[0]) && cwd[1] == '\0')))
3226             return (p + 1);
3227 
3228         return NULL;
3229     }
3230 
3231     /* skip VFS prefix */
3232     while (--p > lwd && !IS_PATH_SEP (*p))
3233         ;
3234     /* get last component */
3235     while (--p > lwd && !IS_PATH_SEP (*p))
3236         ;
3237 
3238     /* return last component */
3239     return (p != lwd || IS_PATH_SEP (*p)) ? p + 1 : p;
3240 }

3247 {
3248 #ifdef ENABLE_SUBSHELL
3249     if (mc_global.tty.use_subshell && vfs_current_is_local ())
3250         do_subshell_chdir (vpath, FALSE);
3251 #else /* ENABLE_SUBSHELL */
3252     (void) vpath;
3253 #endif /* ENABLE_SUBSHELL */
3254 }

3256 /* --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
3257 /**
3258  * Changes the current directory of the panel.
3259  * Don't record change in the directory history.
3260  */
3261 
3262 static gboolean
3263 _do_panel_cd (WPanel * panel, const vfs_path_t * new_dir_vpath, enum cd_enum cd_type)
     /*  [+3263 src/filemanager/panel.c] */
3264 {
3265     vfs_path_t *olddir_vpath;
3266 
3267     /* Convert *new_path to a suitable pathname, handle ~user */
3268     if (cd_type == cd_parse_command)
3269     {
3270         const vfs_path_element_t *element;
3271 
3272         element = vfs_path_get_by_index (new_dir_vpath, 0);
3273         if (strcmp (element->path, "-") == 0)
3274             new_dir_vpath = panel->lwd_vpath;
3275     }
3276 
3277     if (mc_chdir (new_dir_vpath) == -1)
3278         return FALSE;
3279 
3280     /* Success: save previous directory, shutdown status of previous dir */
3281     olddir_vpath = vfs_path_clone (panel->cwd_vpath);
3282     panel_set_lwd (panel, panel->cwd_vpath);
3283     input_free_completions (cmdline);
3284 
3285     vfs_path_free (panel->cwd_vpath);
3286     vfs_setup_cwd ();
3287     panel->cwd_vpath = vfs_path_clone (vfs_get_raw_current_dir ());
3288 
3289     vfs_release_path (olddir_vpath);
3290 
3291     subshell_chdir (panel->cwd_vpath);
3292 
3293     /* Reload current panel */
3294     panel_clean_dir (panel);
3295 
3296     dir_list_load (&panel->dir, panel->cwd_vpath, panel->sort_field->sort_routine,
3297                    &panel->sort_info, panel->filter);
3298     try_to_select (panel, get_parent_dir_name (panel->cwd_vpath, olddir_vpath));
3299 
3300     load_hint (FALSE);
3301     panel->dirty = 1;
3302     update_xterm_title_path ();
3303 
3304     vfs_path_free (olddir_vpath);
3305 
3306     return TRUE;
3307 }

3310 
3311 static void
3312 directory_history_next (WPanel * panel)
     /*  [+3312 src/filemanager/panel.c] */
3313 {
3314     gboolean ok;
3315 
3316     do
3317     {
3318         GList *next;
3319 
3320         ok = TRUE;
3321         next = g_list_next (panel->dir_history_current);
3322         if (next != NULL)
3323         {
3324             vfs_path_t *data_vpath;
3325 
3326             data_vpath = vfs_path_from_str ((char *) next->data);
3327             ok = _do_panel_cd (panel, data_vpath, cd_exact);
3328             vfs_path_free (data_vpath);
3329             panel->dir_history_current = next;
3330         }
3331         /* skip directories that present in history but absent in file system */
3332     }
3333     while (!ok);
3334 }

3356             panel->dir_history_current = prev;
3357         }
3358         /* skip directories that present in history but absent in file system */
3359     }
3360     while (!ok);
3361 }

3363 /* --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
3364 
3365 static void
3366 directory_history_list (WPanel * panel)
     /*  [+3366 src/filemanager/panel.c] */
3367 {
3368     char *s;
3369     gboolean ok = FALSE;
3370     size_t pos;
3371 
3372     pos = g_list_position (panel->dir_history_current, panel->dir_history);
3373 
3374     s = history_show (&panel->dir_history, WIDGET (panel), pos);
3375     if (s != NULL)
3376     {
3377         vfs_path_t *s_vpath;
3378 
3379         s_vpath = vfs_path_from_str (s);
3380         ok = _do_panel_cd (panel, s_vpath, cd_exact);
3381         if (ok)
3382             directory_history_add (panel, panel->cwd_vpath);
3383         else
3384             message (D_ERROR, MSG_ERROR, _("Cannot change directory"));
3385         vfs_path_free (s_vpath);
3386         g_free (s);
3387     }
3388 
3389     if (!ok)
3390     {
3391         /* Since history is fully modified in history_show(), panel->dir_history actually
3392          * points to the invalid place. Try restore current postition here. */
3393 
3394         size_t i;
3395 
3396         panel->dir_history_current = panel->dir_history;
3397 
3398         for (i = 0; i <= pos; i++)
3399         {
3400             GList *prev;
3401 
3402             prev = g_list_previous (panel->dir_history_current);
3403             if (prev == NULL)
3404                 break;
3405 
3406             panel->dir_history_current = prev;
3407         }
3408     }
3409 }

3594 /* --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
3595 
3596 static cb_ret_t
3597 panel_key (WPanel * panel, int key)
     /*  [+3597 src/filemanager/panel.c] */
3598 {
3599     size_t i;
3600 
3601     if (is_abort_char (key))
3602     {
3603         stop_search (panel);
3604         return MSG_HANDLED;
3605     }
3606 
3607     if (panel->searching && ((key >= ' ' && key <= 255) || key == KEY_BACKSPACE))
3608     {
3609         do_search (panel, key);
3610         return MSG_HANDLED;
3611     }
3612 
3613     for (i = 0; panel_map[i].key != 0; i++)
3614         if (key == panel_map[i].key)
3615             return panel_execute_cmd (panel, panel_map[i].command);
3616 
3617     if (panels_options.torben_fj_mode && key == ALT ('h'))
3618     {
3619         goto_middle_file (panel);
3620         return MSG_HANDLED;
3621     }
3622 
3623     if (!command_prompt && ((key >= ' ' && key <= 255) || key == KEY_BACKSPACE))
3624     {
3625         start_search (panel);
3626         do_search (panel, key);
3627         return MSG_HANDLED;
3628     }
3629 
3630     return MSG_NOT_HANDLED;
3631 }

3633 /* --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
3634 
3635 static cb_ret_t
3636 panel_callback (Widget * w, Widget * sender, widget_msg_t msg, int parm, void *data)
     /*  [+3636 src/filemanager/panel.c] */
3637 {
3638     WPanel *panel = PANEL (w);
3639     WButtonBar *bb;
3640 
3641     switch (msg)
3642     {
3643     case MSG_INIT:
3644         /* subscribe to "history_load" event */
3645         mc_event_add (w->owner->event_group, MCEVENT_HISTORY_LOAD, panel_load_history, w, NULL);
3646         /* subscribe to "history_save" event */
3647         mc_event_add (w->owner->event_group, MCEVENT_HISTORY_SAVE, panel_save_history, w, NULL);
3648         return MSG_HANDLED;
3649 
3650     case MSG_DRAW:
3651         /* Repaint everything, including frame and separator */
3652         widget_erase (w);
3653         show_dir (panel);
3654         panel_print_header (panel);
3655         adjust_top_file (panel);
3656         paint_dir (panel);
3657         mini_info_separator (panel);
3658         display_mini_info (panel);
3659         panel->dirty = 0;
3660         return MSG_HANDLED;
3661 
3662     case MSG_FOCUS:
3663         state_mark = -1;
3664         current_panel = panel;
3665         panel->active = 1;
3666 
3667         if (mc_chdir (panel->cwd_vpath) != 0)
3668         {
3669             char *cwd;
3670 
3671             cwd = vfs_path_to_str_flags (panel->cwd_vpath, 0, VPF_STRIP_PASSWORD);
3672             message (D_ERROR, MSG_ERROR, _("Cannot chdir to \"%s\"\n%s"),
3673                      cwd, unix_error_string (errno));
3674             g_free (cwd);
3675         }
3676         else
3677             subshell_chdir (panel->cwd_vpath);
3678 
3679         update_xterm_title_path ();
3680         select_item (panel);
3681 
3682         bb = find_buttonbar (w->owner);
3683         midnight_set_buttonbar (bb);
3684         widget_redraw (WIDGET (bb));
3685         return MSG_HANDLED;
3686 
3687     case MSG_UNFOCUS:
3688         /* Janne: look at this for the multiple panel options */
3689         stop_search (panel);
3690         panel->active = 0;
3691         unselect_item (panel);
3692         return MSG_HANDLED;
3693 
3694     case MSG_KEY:
3695         return panel_key (panel, parm);
3696 
3697     case MSG_ACTION:
3698         return panel_execute_cmd (panel, parm);
3699 
3700     case MSG_DESTROY:
3701         /* unsubscribe from "history_load" event */
3702         mc_event_del (w->owner->event_group, MCEVENT_HISTORY_LOAD, panel_load_history, w);
3703         /* unsubscribe from "history_save" event */
3704         mc_event_del (w->owner->event_group, MCEVENT_HISTORY_SAVE, panel_save_history, w);
3705         panel_destroy (panel);
3706         free_my_statfs ();
3707         return MSG_HANDLED;
3708 
3709     default:
3710         return widget_default_callback (w, sender, msg, parm, data);
3711     }
3712 }

3743 static gboolean
3744 mark_if_marking (WPanel * panel, const mouse_event_t * event)
     /*  [+3744 src/filemanager/panel.c] */
3745 {

3747     {
3748         if (event->msg == MSG_MOUSE_DOWN)
3749             mouse_toggle_mark (panel);

3751             mouse_set_mark (panel);
3752         return TRUE;

3758 /* --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
3759 /** Determine which column was clicked, and sort the panel on
3760  * that column, or reverse sort on that column if already
3761  * sorted on that column.
3762  */
3763 
3764 static void
3765 mouse_sort_col (WPanel * panel, int x)
     /*  [+3765 src/filemanager/panel.c] */
3766 {
3767     int i;
3768     const char *lc_sort_name = NULL;
3769     panel_field_t *col_sort_format = NULL;
3770     format_e *format;
3771 
3772     for (i = 0, format = panel->format; format != NULL; format = format->next)
3773     {
3774         i += format->field_len;
3775         if (x < i + 1)
3776         {
3777             /* found column */
3778             lc_sort_name = format->title;
3779             break;
3780         }
3781     }
3782 
3783     if (lc_sort_name == NULL)
3784         return;
3785 
3786     for (i = 0; panel_fields[i].id != NULL; i++)
3787     {
3788         const char *title;
3789 
3790         title = panel_get_title_without_hotkey (panel_fields[i].title_hotkey);
3791         if (strcmp (title, lc_sort_name) == 0 && panel_fields[i].sort_routine != NULL)
3792         {
3793             col_sort_format = &panel_fields[i];
3794             break;
3795         }
3796     }
3797 
3798     if (col_sort_format == NULL)
3799         return;
3800 
3801     if (panel->sort_field == col_sort_format)
3802     {
3803         /* reverse the sort if clicked column is already the sorted column */
3804         panel->sort_info.reverse = !panel->sort_info.reverse;
3805     }
3806     else
3807     {
3808         /* new sort is forced to be ascending */
3809         panel->sort_info.reverse = FALSE;
3810     }
3811     panel_set_sort_order (panel, col_sort_format);
3812 }
3813 
3814 /* --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
3815 
3816 static void
3817 panel_mouse_callback (Widget * w, mouse_msg_t msg, mouse_event_t * event)
     /*  [+3817 src/filemanager/panel.c] */
3818 {
3819     WPanel *panel = PANEL (w);
3820     gboolean is_active;
3821 
3822     is_active = widget_is_active (w);
3823 
3824     switch (msg)
3825     {
3826     case MSG_MOUSE_DOWN:
3827         if (event->y == 0)
3828         {
3829             /* top frame */
3830             if (event->x == 1)
3831                 /* "<" button */
3832                 directory_history_prev (panel);
3833             else if (event->x == w->cols - 2)
3834                 /* ">" button */
3835                 directory_history_next (panel);
3836             else if (event->x >= w->cols - 5 && event->x <= w->cols - 3)
3837                 /* "^" button */
3838                 directory_history_list (panel);
3839             else if (event->x == w->cols - 6)
3840                 /* "." button show/hide hidden files */
3841                 send_message (midnight_dlg, NULL, MSG_ACTION, CK_ShowHidden, NULL);
3842             else
3843             {
3844                 /* no other events on 1st line, return MOU_UNHANDLED */
3845                 event->result.abort = TRUE;
3846                 /* avoid extra panel redraw */
3847                 panel->dirty = 0;
3848             }
3849             break;
3850         }
3851 
3852         if (event->y == 1)
3853         {
3854             /* sort on clicked column */
3855             mouse_sort_col (panel, event->x + 1);
3856             break;
3857         }
3858 
3859         if (!is_active)
3860             change_panel ();
3861         /* fall through */
3862 
3863     case MSG_MOUSE_DRAG:
3864         {
3865             int y, last, my_index;
3866 
3867             last = panel->dir.len - 1;
3868             y = event->y - 2;
3869 
3870             if (panel->top_file + y > last)
3871                 my_index = last;
3872             else
3873             {
3874                 my_index = panel->top_file + y;
3875 
3876                 if (panel->list_cols > 1)
3877                 {
3878                     int width, lines;
3879 
3880                     width = (w->cols - 2) / panel->list_cols;
3881                     lines = panel_lines (panel);
3882                     my_index += lines * (event->x / width);
3883                 }
3884 
3885                 if (my_index > last)
3886                     my_index = last;
3887             }
3888 
3889             if (my_index != panel->selected)
3890             {
3891                 unselect_item (panel);
3892                 panel->selected = my_index;
3893                 select_item (panel);
3894             }
3895 
3896             /* This one is new */
3897             mark_if_marking (panel, event);
3898         }
3899         break;
3900 
3901     case MSG_MOUSE_UP:
3902         break;
3903 
3904     case MSG_MOUSE_CLICK:
3905         if ((event->count & GPM_DOUBLE) != 0)
3906         {
3907             int y, lines;
3908 
3909             y = event->y - 2;
3910             lines = panel_lines (panel);
3911 
3912             if (y >= 0 && y < lines)
3913                 do_enter (panel);
3914         }
3915         break;
3916 
3917     case MSG_MOUSE_MOVE:
3918         break;
3919 
3920     case MSG_MOUSE_SCROLL_UP:
3921         if (is_active)
3922         {
3923             if (panels_options.mouse_move_pages && panel->top_file > 0)
3924                 prev_page (panel);
3925             else                /* We are in first page */
3926                 move_up (panel);
3927         }
3928         break;
3929 
3930     case MSG_MOUSE_SCROLL_DOWN:
3931         if (is_active)
3932         {
3933             if (panels_options.mouse_move_pages
3934                 && panel->top_file + panel_items (panel) < panel->dir.len)
3935                 next_page (panel);
3936             else                /* We are in last page */
3937                 move_down (panel);
3938         }
3939         break;
3940 
3941     default:
3942         break;
3943     }
3944 
3945     if (panel->dirty)
3946         widget_redraw (w);
3947 }

3949 /* --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
3950 
3951 static void
3952 reload_panelized (WPanel * panel)
     /*  [+3952 src/filemanager/panel.c] */
3953 {
3954     int i, j;
3955     dir_list *list = &panel->dir;
3956 
3957     /* refresh current VFS directory required for vfs_path_from_str() */
3958     (void) mc_chdir (panel->cwd_vpath);
3959 
3960     for (i = 0, j = 0; i < list->len; i++)
3961     {
3962         vfs_path_t *vpath;
3963 
3964         vpath = vfs_path_from_str (list->list[i].fname);
3965         if (mc_lstat (vpath, &list->list[i].st) != 0)
3966             g_free (list->list[i].fname);
3967         else
3968         {
3969             if (j != i)
3970                 list->list[j] = list->list[i];
3971             j++;
3972         }
3973         vfs_path_free (vpath);
3974     }
3975     if (j == 0)
3976         dir_list_init (list);
3977     else
3978         list->len = j;
3979 
3980     recalculate_panel_summary (panel);
3981 
3982     if (panel != current_panel)
3983         (void) mc_chdir (current_panel->cwd_vpath);
3984 }
