3986 /* --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
3987 
3988 static void
3989 update_one_panel_widget (WPanel * panel, panel_update_flags_t flags, const char *current_file)
     /*  [+3989 src/filemanager/panel.c] */
3990 {
3991     gboolean free_pointer;
3992     char *my_current_file = NULL;
3993 
3994     if ((flags & UP_RELOAD) != 0)
3995     {
3996         panel->is_panelized = FALSE;
3997         mc_setctl (panel->cwd_vpath, VFS_SETCTL_FLUSH, 0);
3998         memset (&(panel->dir_stat), 0, sizeof (panel->dir_stat));
3999     }
4000 
4001     /* If current_file == -1 (an invalid pointer) then preserve selection */
4002     free_pointer = current_file == UP_KEEPSEL;
4003 
4004     if (free_pointer)
4005     {
4006         my_current_file = g_strdup (panel->dir.list[panel->selected].fname);
4007         current_file = my_current_file;
4008     }
4009 
4010     if (panel->is_panelized)
4011         reload_panelized (panel);
4012     else
4013         panel_reload (panel);
4014 
4015     try_to_select (panel, current_file);
4016     panel->dirty = 1;
4017 
4018     if (free_pointer)
4019         g_free (my_current_file);
4020 }

4024 static void
4025 update_one_panel (int which, panel_update_flags_t flags, const char *current_file)
     /*  [+4025 src/filemanager/panel.c] */

4038 /* --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
4039 
4040 static void
4041 do_select (WPanel * panel, int i)
     /*  [+4041 src/filemanager/panel.c] */
4042 {
4043     if (i != panel->selected)
4044     {
4045         panel->dirty = 1;
4046         panel->selected = i;
4047         panel->top_file = panel->selected - (WIDGET (panel)->lines - 2) / 2;
4048         if (panel->top_file < 0)
4049             panel->top_file = 0;
4050     }
4051 }
4052 
4053 /* --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
4054 
4055 static void
4056 do_try_to_select (WPanel * panel, const char *name)
     /*  [+4056 src/filemanager/panel.c] */
4057 {
4058     int i;
4059     char *subdir;
4060 
4061     if (!name)
4062     {
4063         do_select (panel, 0);
4064         return;
4065     }
4066 
4067     /* We only want the last component of the directory,
4068      * and from this only the name without suffix.
4069      * Cut prefix if the panel is not panelized */
4070 
4071     if (panel->is_panelized)
4072         subdir = vfs_strip_suffix_from_filename (name);
4073     else
4074         subdir = vfs_strip_suffix_from_filename (x_basename (name));
4075 
4076     /* Search that subdir or filename without prefix (if not panelized panel), select it if found */
4077     for (i = 0; i < panel->dir.len; i++)
4078     {
4079         if (strcmp (subdir, panel->dir.list[i].fname) == 0)
4080         {
4081             do_select (panel, i);
4082             g_free (subdir);
4083             return;
4084         }
4085     }
4086 
4087     /* Try to select a file near the file that is missing */
4088     if (panel->selected >= panel->dir.len)
4089         do_select (panel, panel->dir.len - 1);
4090     g_free (subdir);
4091 }

4112 /* event callback */
4113 static gboolean
4114 panel_save_current_file_to_clip_file (const gchar * event_group_name, const gchar * event_name,
     /*  [+4114 src/filemanager/panel.c] */
4115                                       gpointer init_data, gpointer data)
4116 {
4117     (void) event_group_name;
4118     (void) event_name;
4119     (void) init_data;
4120     (void) data;
4121 
4122     if (current_panel->marked == 0)
4123         mc_event_raise (MCEVENT_GROUP_CORE, "clipboard_text_to_file",
4124                         (gpointer) selection (current_panel)->fname);
4125     else
4126     {
4127         int i;
4128         gboolean first = TRUE;
4129         char *flist = NULL;
4130 
4131         for (i = 0; i < current_panel->dir.len; i++)
4132             if (current_panel->dir.list[i].f.marked != 0)
4133             {                   /* Skip the unmarked ones */
4134                 if (first)
4135                 {
4136                     flist = g_strdup (current_panel->dir.list[i].fname);
4137                     first = FALSE;
4138                 }
4139                 else
4140                 {
4141                     /* Add empty lines after the file */
4142                     char *tmp;
4143 
4144                     tmp =
4145                         g_strconcat (flist, "\n", current_panel->dir.list[i].fname, (char *) NULL);
4146                     g_free (flist);
4147                     flist = tmp;
4148                 }
4149             }
4150 
4151         mc_event_raise (MCEVENT_GROUP_CORE, "clipboard_text_to_file", (gpointer) flist);
4152         g_free (flist);
4153     }
4154     return TRUE;
4155 }

4157 /* --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
4158 
4159 static vfs_path_t *
4160 panel_recursive_cd_to_parent (const vfs_path_t * vpath)
     /*  [+4160 src/filemanager/panel.c] */
4161 {
4162     vfs_path_t *cwd_vpath;
4163 
4164     cwd_vpath = vfs_path_clone (vpath);
4165 
4166     while (mc_chdir (cwd_vpath) < 0)
4167     {
4168         const char *panel_cwd_path;
4169         vfs_path_t *tmp_vpath;
4170 
4171         /* check if path contains only '/' */
4172         panel_cwd_path = vfs_path_as_str (cwd_vpath);
4173         if (IS_PATH_SEP (panel_cwd_path[0]) && panel_cwd_path[1] == '\0')
4174             return NULL;
4175 
4176         tmp_vpath = vfs_path_vtokens_get (cwd_vpath, 0, -1);
4177         vfs_path_free (cwd_vpath);
4178         cwd_vpath =
4179             vfs_path_build_filename (PATH_SEP_STR, vfs_path_as_str (tmp_vpath), (char *) NULL);
4180         vfs_path_free (tmp_vpath);
4181     }
4182 
4183     return cwd_vpath;
4184 }

4381 /* --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
4382 
4383 void
4384 panel_reload (WPanel * panel)
     /*  [+4384 src/filemanager/panel.c] */
4385 {
4386     struct stat current_stat;
4387     vfs_path_t *cwd_vpath;
4388 
4389     if (panels_options.fast_reload && stat (vfs_path_as_str (panel->cwd_vpath), &current_stat) == 0
4390         && current_stat.st_ctime == panel->dir_stat.st_ctime
4391         && current_stat.st_mtime == panel->dir_stat.st_mtime)
4392         return;
4393 
4394     cwd_vpath = panel_recursive_cd_to_parent (panel->cwd_vpath);
4395     vfs_path_free (panel->cwd_vpath);
4396 
4397     if (cwd_vpath == NULL)
4398     {
4399         panel->cwd_vpath = vfs_path_from_str (PATH_SEP_STR);
4400         panel_clean_dir (panel);
4401         dir_list_init (&panel->dir);
4402         return;
4403     }
4404 
4405     panel->cwd_vpath = cwd_vpath;
4406     memset (&(panel->dir_stat), 0, sizeof (panel->dir_stat));
4407     show_dir (panel);
4408 
4409     dir_list_reload (&panel->dir, panel->cwd_vpath, panel->sort_field->sort_routine,
4410                      &panel->sort_info, panel->filter);
4411 
4412     panel->dirty = 1;
4413     if (panel->selected >= panel->dir.len)
4414         do_select (panel, panel->dir.len - 1);
4415 
4416     recalculate_panel_summary (panel);
4417 }
4418 
4419 /* --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
4420 /* Switches the panel to the mode specified in the format           */
4421 /* Seting up both format and status string. Return: 0 - on success; */
4422 /* 1 - format error; 2 - status error; 3 - errors in both formats.  */
4423 
4424 int
4425 set_panel_formats (WPanel * p)
     /*  [+4425 src/filemanager/panel.c] */
4426 {
4427     format_e *form;
4428     char *err = NULL;
4429     int retcode = 0;
4430 
4431     form = use_display_format (p, panel_format (p), &err, FALSE);
4432 
4433     if (err != NULL)
4434     {
4435         g_free (err);
4436         retcode = 1;
4437     }
4438     else
4439     {
4440         delete_format (p->format);
4441         p->format = form;
4442     }
4443 
4444     if (panels_options.show_mini_info)
4445     {
4446         form = use_display_format (p, mini_status_format (p), &err, TRUE);
4447 
4448         if (err != NULL)
4449         {
4450             g_free (err);
4451             retcode += 2;
4452         }
4453         else
4454         {
4455             delete_format (p->status_format);
4456             p->status_format = form;
4457         }
4458     }
4459 
4460     panel_format_modified (p);
4461     panel_update_cols (WIDGET (p), p->frame_size);
4462 
4463     if (retcode)
4464         message (D_ERROR, _("Warning"),
4465                  _("User supplied format looks invalid, reverting to default."));
4466     if (retcode & 0x01)
4467     {
4468         g_free (p->user_format);
4469         p->user_format = g_strdup (DEFAULT_USER_FORMAT);
4470     }
4471     if (retcode & 0x02)
4472     {
4473         g_free (p->user_status_format[p->list_type]);
4474         p->user_status_format[p->list_type] = g_strdup (DEFAULT_USER_FORMAT);
4475     }
4476 
4477     return retcode;
4478 }

4480 /* --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
4481 
4482 /* Select current item and readjust the panel */
4483 void
4484 select_item (WPanel * panel)
     /*  [+4484 src/filemanager/panel.c] */
4485 {
4486     /* Although currently all over the code we set the selection and
4487        top file to decent values before calling select_item, I could
4488        forget it someday, so it's better to do the actual fitting here */
4489 
4490     if (panel->selected < 0)
4491         panel->selected = 0;
4492 
4493     if (panel->selected > panel->dir.len - 1)
4494         panel->selected = panel->dir.len - 1;
4495 
4496     adjust_top_file (panel);
4497 
4498     panel->dirty = 1;
4499 
4500     execute_hooks (select_file_hook);
4501 }

4503 /* --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
4504 /** Clears all files in the panel, used only when one file was marked */
4505 void
4506 unmark_files (WPanel * panel)
     /*  [+4506 src/filemanager/panel.c] */
4507 {
4508     int i;
4509 
4510     if (!panel->marked)
4511         return;
4512 
4513     for (i = 0; i < panel->dir.len; i++)
4514         file_mark (panel, i, 0);
4515 
4516     panel->dirs_marked = 0;
4517     panel->marked = 0;
4518     panel->total = 0;
4519 }
4520 
4521 /* --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
4522 /** Recalculate the panels summary information, used e.g. when marked
4523    files might have been removed by an external command */
4524 
4525 void
4526 recalculate_panel_summary (WPanel * panel)
     /*  [+4526 src/filemanager/panel.c] */
4527 {
4528     int i;
4529 
4530     panel->marked = 0;
4531     panel->dirs_marked = 0;
4532     panel->total = 0;
4533 
4534     for (i = 0; i < panel->dir.len; i++)
4535         if (panel->dir.list[i].f.marked)
4536         {
4537             /* do_file_mark will return immediately if newmark == oldmark.
4538                So we have to first unmark it to get panel's summary information
4539                updated. (Norbert) */
4540             panel->dir.list[i].f.marked = 0;
4541             do_file_mark (panel, i, 1);
4542         }
4543 }
4544 
4545 /* --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
4546 /** This routine marks a file or a directory */
4547 
4548 void
4549 do_file_mark (WPanel * panel, int idx, int mark)
     /*  [+4549 src/filemanager/panel.c] */
4550 {
4551     if (panel->dir.list[idx].f.marked == mark)
4552         return;
4553 
4554     /* Only '..' can't be marked, '.' isn't visible */
4555     if (DIR_IS_DOTDOT (panel->dir.list[idx].fname))
4556         return;
4557 
4558     file_mark (panel, idx, mark);
4559     if (panel->dir.list[idx].f.marked)
4560     {
4561         panel->marked++;
4562 
4563         if (S_ISDIR (panel->dir.list[idx].st.st_mode))
4564         {
4565             if (panel->dir.list[idx].f.dir_size_computed)
4566                 panel->total += (uintmax_t) panel->dir.list[idx].st.st_size;
4567             panel->dirs_marked++;
4568         }
4569         else
4570             panel->total += (uintmax_t) panel->dir.list[idx].st.st_size;
4571 
4572         set_colors (panel);
4573     }
4574     else
4575     {
4576         if (S_ISDIR (panel->dir.list[idx].st.st_mode))
4577         {
4578             if (panel->dir.list[idx].f.dir_size_computed)
4579                 panel->total -= (uintmax_t) panel->dir.list[idx].st.st_size;
4580             panel->dirs_marked--;
4581         }
4582         else
4583             panel->total -= (uintmax_t) panel->dir.list[idx].st.st_size;
4584 
4585         panel->marked--;
4586     }
4587 }

4607 void
4608 file_mark (WPanel * panel, int lc_index, int val)
     /*  [+4608 src/filemanager/panel.c] */
4609 {
4610     if (panel->dir.list[lc_index].f.marked != val)

4617 /* --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
4618 
4619 void
4620 panel_re_sort (WPanel * panel)
     /*  [+4620 src/filemanager/panel.c] */
4621 {
4622     char *filename;
4623     int i;
4624 
4625     if (panel == NULL)
4626         return;
4627 
4628     filename = g_strdup (selection (panel)->fname);
4629     unselect_item (panel);
4630     dir_list_sort (&panel->dir, panel->sort_field->sort_routine, &panel->sort_info);
4631     panel->selected = -1;
4632 
4633     for (i = panel->dir.len; i != 0; i--)
4634         if (strcmp (panel->dir.list[i - 1].fname, filename) == 0)
4635         {
4636             panel->selected = i - 1;
4637             break;
4638         }
4639 
4640     g_free (filename);
4641     panel->top_file = panel->selected - panel_items (panel) / 2;
4642     select_item (panel);
4643     panel->dirty = 1;
4644 }

4646 /* --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
4647 
4648 void
4649 panel_set_sort_order (WPanel * panel, const panel_field_t * sort_order)
     /*  [+4649 src/filemanager/panel.c] */
4650 {
4651     if (sort_order == NULL)
4652         return;
4653 
4654     panel->sort_field = sort_order;
4655 
4656     /* The directory is already sorted, we have to load the unsorted stuff */
4657     if (sort_order->sort_routine == (GCompareFunc) unsorted)
4658     {
4659         char *current_file;
4660 
4661         current_file = g_strdup (panel->dir.list[panel->selected].fname);
4662         panel_reload (panel);
4663         try_to_select (panel, current_file);
4664         g_free (current_file);
4665     }
4666     panel_re_sort (panel);
4667 }

4671 #ifdef HAVE_CHARSET
4672 
4673 /**
4674  * Change panel encoding.
4675  * @param panel WPanel object
4676  */
4677 
4678 void
4679 panel_change_encoding (WPanel * panel)
     /*  [+4679 src/filemanager/panel.c] */
4680 {
4681     const char *encoding = NULL;
4682     char *errmsg;
4683     int r;
4684 
4685     r = select_charset (-1, -1, panel->codepage, FALSE);
4686 
4687     if (r == SELECT_CHARSET_CANCEL)
4688         return;                 /* Cancel */
4689 
4690     panel->codepage = r;
4691 
4692     if (panel->codepage == SELECT_CHARSET_NO_TRANSLATE)
4693     {
4694         /* No translation */
4695         vfs_path_t *cd_path_vpath;
4696 
4697         g_free (init_translation_table (mc_global.display_codepage, mc_global.display_codepage));
4698         cd_path_vpath = remove_encoding_from_path (panel->cwd_vpath);
4699         do_panel_cd (panel, cd_path_vpath, cd_parse_command);
4700         show_dir (panel);
4701         vfs_path_free (cd_path_vpath);
4702         return;
4703     }
4704 
4705     errmsg = init_translation_table (panel->codepage, mc_global.display_codepage);
4706     if (errmsg != NULL)

4709         g_free (errmsg);
4710         return;
4711     }
4712

4714     if (encoding != NULL)
4715     {
4716         vfs_path_change_encoding (panel->cwd_vpath, encoding);
4717 
4718         if (!do_panel_cd (panel, panel->cwd_vpath, cd_parse_command))
4719             message (D_ERROR, MSG_ERROR, _("Cannot chdir to \"%s\""),
4720                      vfs_path_as_str (panel->cwd_vpath));
4721     }
4722 }

4724 /* --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
4725 
4726 /**
4727  * Remove encode info from last path element.
4728  *
4729  */
4730 vfs_path_t *
4731 remove_encoding_from_path (const vfs_path_t * vpath)
     /*  [+4731 src/filemanager/panel.c] */
4732 {
4733     vfs_path_t *ret_vpath;
4734     GString *tmp_conv;
4735     int indx;
4736 
4737     ret_vpath = vfs_path_new ();
4738 
4739     tmp_conv = g_string_new ("");
4740 
4741     for (indx = 0; indx < vfs_path_elements_count (vpath); indx++)
4742     {
4743         GIConv converter;
4744         vfs_path_element_t *path_element;
4745 
4746         path_element = vfs_path_element_clone (vfs_path_get_by_index (vpath, indx));
4747 
4748         if (path_element->encoding == NULL)
4749         {
4750             vfs_path_add_element (ret_vpath, path_element);
4751             continue;
4752         }
4753 
4754         converter = str_crt_conv_to (path_element->encoding);
4755         if (converter == INVALID_CONV)
4756         {
4757             vfs_path_add_element (ret_vpath, path_element);
4758             continue;
4759         }
4760 
4761         MC_PTR_FREE (path_element->encoding);
4762 
4763         str_vfs_convert_from (converter, path_element->path, tmp_conv);
4764 
4765         g_free (path_element->path);
4766         path_element->path = g_strndup (tmp_conv->str, tmp_conv->len);
4767 
4768         g_string_set_size (tmp_conv, 0);
4769 
4770         str_close_conv (converter);
4771         str_close_conv (path_element->dir.converter);
4772         path_element->dir.converter = INVALID_CONV;
4773         vfs_path_add_element (ret_vpath, path_element);
4774     }
4775     g_string_free (tmp_conv, TRUE);
4776     return ret_vpath;
4777 }
4778 #endif /* HAVE_CHARSET */
4779 
4780 /* --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
4781 
4782 /**
4783  * This routine reloads the directory in both panels. It tries to
4784  * select current_file in current_panel and other_file in other_panel.
4785  * If current_file == -1 then it automatically sets current_file and
4786  * other_file to the currently selected files in the panels.
4787  *
4788  * If flags has the UP_ONLY_CURRENT bit toggled on, then it
4789  * will not reload the other panel.
4790  *
4791  * @param flags for reload panel
4792  * @param current_file name of the current file
4793  */
4794 
4795 void
4796 update_panels (panel_update_flags_t flags, const char *current_file)
     /*  [+4796 src/filemanager/panel.c] */
4797 {
4798     WPanel *panel;
4799 
4800     /* first, update other panel... */
4801     if ((flags & UP_ONLY_CURRENT) == 0)
4802         update_one_panel (get_other_index (), flags, UP_KEEPSEL);
4803     /* ...then current one */
4804     update_one_panel (get_current_index (), flags, current_file);
4805 
4806     if (get_current_type () == view_listing)
4807         panel = PANEL (get_panel_widget (get_current_index ()));
4808     else
4809         panel = PANEL (get_panel_widget (get_other_index ()));
4810 
4811     if (!panel->is_panelized)
4812         (void) mc_chdir (panel->cwd_vpath);
4813 }

4984 gboolean
4985 do_cd (const vfs_path_t * new_dir_vpath, enum cd_enum exact)
     /*  [+4985 src/filemanager/panel.c] */
4986 {
4987     gboolean res;
4988     const vfs_path_t *_new_dir_vpath = new_dir_vpath;
4989 
4990     if (current_panel->is_panelized)
4991     {
4992         size_t new_vpath_len;
4993 
4994         new_vpath_len = vfs_path_len (new_dir_vpath);
4995         if (vfs_path_equal_len (new_dir_vpath, panelized_panel.root_vpath, new_vpath_len))
4996             _new_dir_vpath = panelized_panel.root_vpath;
4997     }
4998 
4999     res = do_panel_cd (current_panel, _new_dir_vpath, exact);
5000 
5001 #ifdef HAVE_CHARSET
5002     if (res)
5003     {
5004         const vfs_path_element_t *path_element;
5005 
5006         path_element = vfs_path_get_by_index (current_panel->cwd_vpath, -1);
5007         if (path_element->encoding != NULL)
5008             current_panel->codepage = get_codepage_index (path_element->encoding);
5009         else
5010             current_panel->codepage = SELECT_CHARSET_NO_TRANSLATE;
5011     }
5012 #endif /* HAVE_CHARSET */
5013 
5014     return res;
5015 }
